name: Buddy
description:
The Buddy is part of our 'Value' range.
Stunning Red and Beige stripes make this stylish dog bed perfect for the contemporary, coastal or chic home.The fabric is a medium weight indoor/outdoor canvas, which makes it perfect for summer living on the deck.

Oscar & lulu,s inserts are also designed and made here in Australia, the cover is made from cotton, which makes them more durable and longer lasting, then filled with premium 'A' grade polyester filling which is flea and mildew resistant.

All our cushion covers are stitched in heavy duty thread are zippered for easy take on/off.

Care Instructions: Vacuum regularly. Hand wash or gentle machine wash

Also available "Coverlet" a 'Covers Only" option

Available in 3 sizes:
 
Small 65cm X 65cm 
Medium 75cm X 75cm 
Large 95cm X 95cm

name: Personalized monogrammed  Bailey and Charlie beds
description:
Once your bed has been ordered we will contact you regarding name you want monogrammed and the colour of bed.

Colours available for Bailey bed are Pebble, Ocean, Charcoal and Driftwood.
Colours available for Charlie bed are Slate, Natural and Pebble.

The Bailey range is a very sophisticated with colour inspiration from the seaside, all cushions are trimmed in white, to give that real coastal feel. These cushions are part of our Indoor/Outdoor Range,the fabric is what's known as a "performance fabric", with protection woven into every fibre, its water and stain, mould and mildew resistant. 

The Charlie range is a luxurious chunky cord that feels and looks divine, it comes in three stunning tones. This range not only offers optimum comfort for your dog, but is also very stylish and will look gorgeous in a variety of interior settings. 
These cushions can be used anywhere and are perfect for your 
Indoor/Outdoor dog. 

Oscar & lulu,s inserts are also designed and made here in Australia, the cover is made from cotton, which makes them more durable and longer lasting, then filled with premium 'A' grade polyester filling which is flea and mildew resistant.
All our cushion covers are stitched in heavy duty thread are zippered for easy take on/off.

Care Instructions: Vacuum regularly. Hand wash or Dry clean.

Also available "Coverlet" a 'Covers Only" option

Available in 3 sizes: Small 65cm X 65cm X 15cm 
Medium 75cm X 75cm X 15cm 
Large 95cm X 95cm X 15cm

name: Monogrammed Lulu Bed
description:
Once your bed has been ordered we will contact you regarding name you want monogrammed and the colour of bed.

Colours for the Lulu bed are Pink, Blue and Lime

Lulu is our Eco friendly pet bed, made from recycled PET bottles it offers a great option, for our Eco conscious customers, especially when teamed with one of our ECO inserts.The fabric is rated 'heavy commercial', although lovely and soft to touch it is extremely hard wearing. The fabric is manufactured from recycled plastic bottles. 
Lulu comes in three funky colours with contrast trim, that will be a bright addition to any interior, from Modern to the latest Bohemian look. 

Oscar & lulu,s inserts are also designed and made here in Australia, the cover is made from cotton, which makes them more durable and longer lasting, then filled with premium 'A' grade polyester filling which is flea and mildew resistant.
All our cushion covers are stitched in heavy duty thread are zippered for easy take on/off.

Care Instructions: Vacuum regularly. Hand wash or Dry clean.

Also available "Coverlet" a 'Covers Only" option

Available in 3 sizes: Small 65cm X 65cm X 15cm 
Medium 75cm X 75cm X 15cm 
Large 95cm X 95cm X 15cm

Colours available for Wallace bed are Orange, Black, Red and Beige

The Wallace range contemporariness style, with their clean, fresh lines, they will be a stand out in any home. These cushions are also part of our Indoor/Outdoor range being made from a performance fabric, it's water, stain, mould, and mildew resistant, they are perfect for the Indoor/ Outdoor dog.

name: Frankie Orange
description:
Frankie is a funky little number made from faux cowhide fabric, co-ordinated with gorgeous bright colours from the lulu range. Both fabrics are lovely and soft to touch, while being extremely durable, with a commercial durability rating. We think this funky little number will appeal to the trendiest of pooches and would be a standout in any home's interior.
More colours to come!

Oscar & lulu,s inserts are also designed and made here in Australia, the cover is made from cotton, which makes them more durable and longer lasting, then filled with premium 'A' grade polyester filling which is flea and mildew reistant.

name: Vintage Blanket bed- Lime
description:
Oscar & Lulu uses upcycled Vintage woollen blankets and lovingly turns them into one off designer Dog beds.

Now there is more to these blankets than meets the eye. These brightly plaid beauties bear a sense of nostalgia. They themselves have already stood the test of time - and this is a quality we have enormous respect for. We believe in the value of passing special things down through the generations, so what better material to use than the humble woollen blanket and turn them into truly unique designer dog beds, that would be an asset to any Interior.

Each Blanket is chosen for their  beautiful colours and trimmed with coordinating piping, or faux leather trim.

Every blanket is pre hand washed before we make up into a bed, as they are made from 100% wool they are perfect for your dog to snuggle into on that cold winters night.

As this is an upcycled product imperfections can occur.

Oscar & lulu,s inserts are also designed and made here in Australia, the cover is made from cotton, which makes them more durable and longer lasting, then filled with premium 'A' grade polyester filling which is flea and mildew resistant. 

All our cushion covers are stitched in heavy duty thread are zippered for easy take on/off.

Care: Gentle hand or machine on Wool wash setting, drip dry, Cannot be Tumbled Dried.

Want a Vintage Blanket bed, but the colours are not
quite right for you? Contact Lisa at lisa@oscarandlulu.com.au and make your custom order from our beautiful selection of blankets.

Also comes in a "Coverlet" covers option

Available in 3 sizes: Small 65cm X 65cm X 15cm 
Medium 75cm X 75cm X 15cm 
Large 95cm X 95cm X 15cm

name: Fido
description:
The 'Fido' bed embraces the names, places and emotions that are woven into such journeys.
The fabric is extremely hard wearing, being of commercial upholstery standard, and will stand the test of time.
The 'Fido ' will bring a modern twist to most interiors, while still offering optimum comfort for your dog.
All our cushion covers are stitched in heavy duty thread are zippered for easy take on/off.
Oscar & lulu,s inserts are also designed and made here in Australia, the cover is made from cotton, which makes them more durable and longer lasting, then filled with premium 'A' grade polyester filling which is flea and mildew reistant.

Care Instructions: Hand Wash or Gentle Machine wash

Also available in a "Covers Only" option

Available in 3 sizes: Small 65cm X 65cm
Medium 75cm X 75cm 
Large 95cm X 95cm

name: Design your own luxury dog bed!
description:
Design your very own individual designer dog bed, that complements your very own  interior furnishings.
Whether you choose to use your own fabric or we source the fabric for you, the options are endless!

After choosing the right size bed for your dog, email us with your  chosen fabric design and we will contact you regarding fabric requirements and start the production process.

Price is for insert and making of bed, fabric cost will be added on application.

Beds usually take up to 10 days to manufacture after receiving fabric.

Oscar & lulu,s inserts are also designed and made here in Australia, the cover is made from cotton, which makes them more durable and longer lasting, then filled with premium 'A' grade polyester filling which is flea and mildew resistant. 
All our cushion covers are stitched in heavy duty thread are zippered for easy take off.

Also available as a "covers only" option.

Available in 3 sizes: Small 65cm X 65cm X 15cm 
Medium 75cm X 75cm X 15cm 
Large 95cm X 95cm X 15cm

description:
The Charlie range ia a luxurious chunky cord that feels and looks divine, it comes in three stunning tones. This range not only offers optimum comfort for your dog, but is also very stylish and will look gorgeous in a variety of interior settings.
Oscar & lulu,s inserts are also designed and made here in Australia, the cover is made from cotton, which makes them more durable and longer lasting, then filled with premium 'A' grade polyester filling which is flea and mildew reistant.
All our cushion covers are stitched in heavy duty thread are zippered for easy take on/off.

Care Instructions: Vacuum regularly. Hand wash or Dry clean.

Also available "Coverlet" a 'Covers Only" option

Available in 3 sizes:      Small     65cm X 65cm X 15cm
                                Medium 75cm X 75cm X 15cm
                                Large    95cm X 95cm X 15cm

name: Sport Team Beds
description:
Sport Team inspired beds are now available!

Once your bed order has been placed we will contact you regarding colours you want to represent your team and Name on bed if required.
N.B: two colours are the maximum that can be ordered.

Now your four legged friend's can support your sport team, with their very own luxury dog bed made in the colours of your favourite team.

Team beds are made from a Polyester/ Cotton light upholstery weight fabric, which are hard wearing and easy to care for.

Oscar & lulu,s inserts are also designed and made here in Australia, the cover is made from cotton, which makes them more durable and longer lasting, then filled with premium 'A' grade polyester filling which is flea and mildew resistant. 
All our cushion covers are stitched in heavy duty thread and zippered for easy take on/off.
Care Instructions: Vacuum regularly. Hand wash or Dry clean.

Also available "Coverlet" a 'Covers Only" option

Available in 3 sizes:

Small 65cm X 65cm X 15cm 
Medium 75cm X 75cm X 15cm 
Large 95cm X 95cm X 15cm

name: ***SALE BEDS***
description:
We are selling discontinued and sample beds at reduced prices, so grab yourself  bargain!

Beds will be updated as they become available. 

You can either buy complete bed or just the cover, to give your Pooch a change on exist bed.

 Oscar & lulu,s inserts are also designed and made here in Australia, the cover is made from cotton, which makes them more durable and longer lasting, then filled with premium 'A' grade polyester filling which is flea and mildew resistant.

All our cushion covers are stitched in heavy duty thread are zippered for easy take on/off.

Care Instructions: Vacuum regularly. Hand wash or gentle machine wash
